sections.heading: Repealed.Section 22-15B-2 - Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 1999, ch. 234, § 1; repealed by Laws 2023, ch. 161, § 8.

Repeals.— Laws 2023, ch. 161, § 8 repealed 22-15B-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1999, ch. 234, § 1, relating to statewide educational technology opportunity program, findings and purpose, effective July 1, 2023. For provisions of former section,seethe 2022 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 1999, ch. 234, § 2; repealed by Laws 2023, ch. 161, § 8.

Repeals.— Laws 2023, ch. 161, § 8 repealed 22-15B-2 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1999, ch. 234, § 2, relating to educational technology opportunity program, duties of the public education department, effective July 1, 2023. For provisions of former section,seethe 2022 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
